AD.name: Directories
AD.description: List of directories to scan for bundles to install.

AD.name: Poll Intervall
AD.description: How many milliseconds time to sleep between directory scans.

AD.description: The start level to assign to bundles installed by the dirdeployer bundle.

AD.name: Uninstall all on stop
AD.description: If set to true the dirdeployer bundle will uninstall all bundles it has installed when it is stopped.
